summary: During the Second World War, a young man, with the help of some animated puppets, must stop the Nazis who attacked his family and kidnapped his girlfriend.
cast: Levi Fiehler|Jenna Gallaher|Taylor M. Graham|Tom Sandoval|Jerry Hoffman|Erica Shaffer|Ada Chao|Mike Brooks|Aaron Riber|Xiangfu Zhang|Gu Yingfeng|Peter Frankland|William Hickey|Andrew Kimbrough
title: Puppet Master: Axis of Evil
